Develop and execute training initiatives for end-users and Provide knowledge transfer, training and support to Interactors, Viewers, and users. Performing and documenting data analysis, data validation, and data mapping/design. Create and edit complex SQL queries (SQL Server, Postgres) Work under tight deadlines in a highly dynamic environment, manage multiple tasks and projects, and effectively coordinate with Admin Team for Production Deployment. Define features, phases, and solution requirements for data products Create solution prototypes including hands-on coding and configuration Assist in the development, testing, and implementation of technology solutions, and report on delivery commitments to ensure solutions are implemented as expected and to agreed timeframes Optimize joint development efforts through appropriate database use, project design, and business process flows Entry QualificationsBachelor’s degree in a related field from an accredited college or university OR equivalent experience AND: 3 years or equivalent experience as a Business Intelligence Developer 3 years or equivalent experience with relational database systems Demonstratable experience with programming languages (SQL, Python, R) and knowledge of ETL processes, end-to-end data warehousing principles, methodologies, and practices to include understanding the constraints and limitations Ability to collaborate with business leaders and communicate findings at an executive level Ability to perform data analysis and troubleshoot data integrity issues Experience in research design, visualization techniques, and analysis approaches in which you manage and analyze both structured and unstructured data Experience modeling high-dimensional data Experience with tools and languages in the design and implementation of data pipelines that support the CI/CD process Preferred QualificationsExperience with public health domain is a plus Prior ArcGIS experience (must be demonstratable) Prior Tableau experience (must be demonstratable) Prior R Shiny experience (must be demonstratable) Familiarity with Command Line Interface (CLI) tools and/or equivalent Cloud computing tool TekWissen® Group is an equal opportunity/affirmative action Employer (m/f/d/v) supporting workforce diversity.

title: Senior Product Manager
job_description: DescriptionThe  Product Manager  should operate as a strategic thinker, capable of owning and driving key initiatives for the Global Product organization and their key stakeholders. The role holder will be responsible for executing against the vision and priorities in a collaborative approach working across business, technology, risk, operations and other functions to ensure that product vision, strategy, performance and priorities, roadmaps, capacity/consumption and impacts are clear and understood.  What Are We Looking For in This Role?   Product Managers are responsible for the definition, prioritization, and management of the product backlog and roadmap.  Partner closely with stakeholders to define the strategic direction, vision and roadmap for our product suite.  Collect, organize, and evaluate feedback from stakeholders.  Define requirements, user stories and features, and work with the development teams to estimate and schedule the work.  Employing a variety of techniques to assess stakeholder needs and feedback to help direct roadmaps.  Work with development teams regarding feature prioritization, and/or use case and product requirements, escalating and tracking defect issues through to resolution, regular communication with internal stakeholders of gaps that exist between the existing product and stakeholder expectations.  Product Managers will need to understand business requirements, determine value, translate those into user stories, work with the development teams to translate requirements/stories into actionable development tasks.  Prioritize requested work and provide transparency around execution roadmaps.  Collaborate with product design, product ops, engineering teams and other stakeholders, conduct workshops and discovery to create the bridge between market needs and feature delivery.  Lead execution by an engineering team(s) and work with development teams on feature prioritization, use case and product requirements, and driving and tracking both defect and enhancement development.  Accountable to make and deliver against commitments made to business stakeholders.  This position requires daily attention to processes in place, deadlines and quality standards are met, risks identified and mitigated, and professional communications are maintained on a regular schedule to stakeholders.  The Product Manager bears responsibility to ensure a positive stakeholder engagement experience by delivering a desirable product while taking a vocal leadership role in the product build process.  Facilitate communication amongst project leaders, peers and relevant cross-functional stakeholders to maintain alignment and awareness of product performance and vision  Identify and take ownership of problems in targeted segments through constant engagement with our stakeholders  Work with the Product team to understand end-users product requirements and desired features, work with internal teams to communicate product requirements, and monitor tasks  Take the initiative to recommend process improvements and demonstrate creative thinking  Identify new product enhancements, synergies, etc to drive value for the organization.    What Are Our Desired Skills and Capabilities?    Minimum 1-3 years product management experience.  Experience working on technology products as either a product manager, product owner, or business analyst  Experience managing product performance, driving and supporting other functions to maximize product performance while measuring appropriate metrics and championing success stories.  Proven track record of delivering success while operating within a team environment.  Product management experience with data management and/ or API documentation tools  Take the initiative to recommend process improvements and demonstrate creative thinking  The mindset of a creative problem solver and critical thinker who is able to articulate the problems that we need to be passionate about solving.  A strong focus on collaboration, placing high importance on developing the trust of supporting functions and stakeholders.  Strong written and verbal communication skills.  Prior payments or technology industry experience is preferred but not required.  Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience At Global Payments our vision is to be “Champions of Inclusion.” We are fully committed and focused on creating a better tomorrow in the communities in which we live and work. We aspire to ensure fair treatment, access, opportunity and advancement for all team members. We believe all team members should be able to bring their true, authentic selves to the workplace and feel accepted, engaged and understood.
Industries: Financial Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
